meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of the sansculottes.
meanings.sent1: Her sansculottish outfit consisted of simple, plain clothes.
meanings.sent2: The room had a sansculottish feel with its rustic furniture and minimal decor.
meanings.sent3: He tried to make his fancy suit look sansculottish by removing all the embellishments.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a mysterious, sansculottish aura that intrigued visitors.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of the sansculottish landscape in his painting.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the sansculottes.
meanings.sent1: The sansculottish beliefs emphasized equality and freedom for all.
meanings.sent2: The historian studied the sansculottish movement during the French Revolution.
meanings.sent3: In the play, the characters debated the sansculottish principles of democracy.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was filled with passion for the sansculottish ideals of justice.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed artifacts from the sansculottish era to educate visitors.

meanings.definition: Wearing the clothing of the sansculottes.
meanings.sent1: The actors wore sansculottish attire for the historical reenactment.
meanings.sent2: She looked sansculottish in her loose-fitting trousers and simple shirt.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone dressed in a sansculottish style.
meanings.sent4: The fashion designer created a modern twist on the traditional sansculottish clothing.
meanings.sent5: The students put on a play dressed in authentic sansculottish garments.
